name: CLP_EOB_LN_REMIT_LINES
description: This table holds the service line level matched remittance image lines.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim print record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EOB_LN_REMIT_LINES
columns.description: This item points to the remittance lines with which this related group line is associated.
